processInputData.name: processInputData
processInputData.processRule: {var scheduledDate = new Date(contextVar.data.startTime); var dueDate = new Date(contextVar.data.endTime); contextVar.estimatedDuration = Math.round( endDate.getTime()- startDate.getTime() )/60000; contextVar.id = contextVar.data.id; contextVar.assignedToUserId = contextVar.data.userId; contextVar.processInstanceId = contextVar.data.instanceId;contextVar.subAction = 'upsertTask';}

processInputDataForInstanceUpdate.name: processInputDataForInstanceUpdate
processInputDataForInstanceUpdate.processRule: {var plannedStartTime = new Date(contextVar.data.startTime); var plannedEndTime = new Date(contextVar.data.endTime); contextVar.estimatedDurationInHours = Math.round(estimatedDuration/60); contextVar.id = contextVar.data.id; contextVar.assignedToUserId = contextVar.data.userId; contextVar.instanceId = contextVar.data.instanceId;contextVar.subAction = 'updateInstance';}
